comments: Bertans (CHA) is slightly extending laterally prior to marginal body contact occurring with Henderson (POR) at the end of the drive.

Pokusevski (CHA) jumps vertically and absorbs the contact during Walker's (POR) upward shooting motion. Pokusevski then brushes Walker's right elbow and further marginal contact occurs during Walker's layup attempt.
Williams (CHA) establishes himself in Henderson's (POR) path and does not deliver illegal contact as he sets the pick.

Bertans (CHA) and Rupert (POR) engage and disengage with one another after the release of the shot attempt. Bertans then brings his right hand outward prior to further marginal contact occurring with Rupert's upper body following the change of possession.
Henderson (POR) engages and disengages with Williams (CHA), and marginal contact occurs as Williams pursues the rebound.
Ayton (POR) is already in Williams' (CHA) path and marginal contact occurs when they come together as Williams moves to set the screen.
Williams (CHA) re-establishes slightly following the initial contact with Walker (POR) during the screen, and further marginal contact occurs simultaneously with the defensive switch.
Miller (CHA) and Walker (POR) engage and disengage with one another, and marginal contact occurs as they each move toward the screen during the inbound.
Bertans (CHA) touches the ball last before it goes out of bounds.
Williams (CHA) moves to align alongside Henderson's (POR) path when marginal body contact occurs after Henderson's gather.
Mann (CHA) brings his left hand toward the ball prior to marginal contact occurring with Ayton's (POR) right arm during Ayton's upward shooting motion.
Bertans (CHA) moves forward into Banton (POR) and initiates body contact that affects Banton's SQBR.
Bertans (CHA) commits a take foul on Henderson (POR). The transition take foul rule does not apply to the last two minutes of either the fourth quarter or overtime.

Williams (CHA) and Bertans (CHA) each bring a hand toward the ball and marginal contact occurs with Ayton's (POR) right arm and left side, respectively, prior to Miller (CHA) cleanly dislodging the ball away.
Ayton (POR) brings his hands toward the ball as he attempts to tie Miller (CHA) up, and marginal contact occurs with Miller's left arm/side simultaneously.
Williams (CHA) establishes himself in Henderson's (POR) path and does not deliver illegal contact.
Ayton (POR) brings his hands outward prior to marginal contact occurring with Miller's (CHA) left side after his gather.
Miller (CHA) commits a take foul on Walker (POR). The transition take foul rule does not apply to the last two minutes of either the fourth quarter or overtime.
Miller (CHA) and Rupert (POR) come together at the same spot in the lane during the inbound, and incidental body contact occurs.
Henderson (POR) legally contests Bertans' (CHA) jump shot attempt.
